com.persistit.exception

Class AppendableIOException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • com.persistit.exception.AppendableIOException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class AppendableIOException
extends RuntimeException
    Unchecked wrapper for an IOException used in a context where the Appendable.append(java.lang.CharSequence) operation throws an IOException. Since most uses of methods that take an Appendable will operate on StringBuilders, for which an IOException is never thrown, it is desirable for calling code not to have to catch and handle IOException. Therefore any IOException from invoking append on a different Appendable implementation is caught and thrown as this unchecked type.
    Version:
    1.0
    See Also:
